page.title: 10Amenities in Colden Common
page.content: The main social centre of the village is the 90 year old Village Hall. Although inconveniently situated on the eastern side of the busy main road in the village,the Hall is in daily use by the numerous village organisations.However,fire regulations limit the capacity to 90 people and this is no longer adequate for the growing needs of the village.The Village Association has begun the first moves towards the funding of a new community centre which will be sited nearer the physical centre of the village.It is hoped that this will provide better meeting facilities, particularly for the young people of the village,a sports area and, possibly,facilities for a doctor's surgery - something which the village at present lacks.
